channel.title: What to do with multiple int main()
channel.description:
Once I added KeyAuth in my code the int main from KeyAuth is interfering with my already existing one and when I remove mine the code breaks. Any help on how to fix it? # Compiler Error C2447
Yes Abastrax I know you cannot have multiple int mains but how would one add KeyAuth without breaking the already existing code?
